Class SpellChecker

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISpellChecker

    public class SpellChecker
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISpellChecker
    Stores the array of strings and provides a method check to search it.
    Author:
    cs2001 student
